title: Full Draft Recap + Best Value Picks by Round
itunes:title: Full Draft Recap + Best Value Picks by Round
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode following the conclusion of the 2020 NFL Draft. To start off, the guys discuss the predictions they made before the draft that ended up happening (3:25). After that, they recap the draft by breaking down multiple picks and analyzing which teams got better. Next, the pair look at the Eagles philosophy in drafting QB Jalen Hurts (28:35). Then, the duo discuss the Saints re-signing QB Taysom Hill and also signing QB Jameis Winston (34:10). To wrap up the show, the guys each give their best value picks by round (38:44).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
